ygData.subject: Lifetap line of spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard (read a post at CastersRealm) that now our Lifetap spells have had their resistance rate raised a by a LOT. Before they were pretty much
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard (read a post at CastersRealm) that now our Lifetap spells have
had their resistance rate raised a by a LOT. Before they were pretty much
unresistable.Now they are supposed to be as bad as the Darkness line of
spells.I have been away from EQ for several days so I can not say if this is
true or not, I intend to see for myself today.If this IS true than this is
complete BS! I mean, us Necros are being hit left and right by these stupid
patches.They powered down our high level pets, weakened our DOTs, and now
THIS?! I mean come on! What does Verant have against us?

The possibly soon to be deleted Necromancer,
Aazen SyVex
